item.title: SoftLayer_User_Permission_Role
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Permission_Role Service Datatype Description Local accountId A permission roles associated [[SoftLayer_Account|customer account]] id. Type: integer createDate The date the permission role record was created. Type: dateTime description The description of the permission role. Type: string id A permission roles internal identifying number. Type: integer modifyDate The date the permission role record was last modified.
